historical_summary: Xavier has been focusing on trading models and quant finance, showing a keen interest in the practical applications of blockchain and Web3 technologies. He has been networking with industry professionals and exploring opportunities in the crypto space.
He experienced a setback with a job loss but has since re-engaged with the crypto world, researching market trends, and setting up a plan to trade smarter.
Xavier has utilized AI coding assistants to work on his trading models, which have become more sophisticated.
projected: AI Integration: Xavier will likely incorporate more advanced features of AI coding assistants to automate parts of his trading strategy, focusing on real-time market analysis and predictive modeling.

Networking: Xavier will continue to build his professional network, attending more industry meetups and possibly joining a quant trading group or forum to discuss strategies and market insights.

historical_summary: Xavier has become more aware of $XVI, a cryptocurrency on Solana linked to his life, and has observed its price movements with intrigue.
